authors: William Kertz, Son of Oak Game Studio
instructions: Free character sheet for City of Mist RPG! Venture into a modern City full of crime and magic with this set of Character & Theme cards (inc Crew and Extra themes), status cards, and full Player Moves buttons with outcomes and descriptions integrated into chat. This sheet supports the complete City of Mist ruleset. Check out our upcoming Marketplace package for character creation Themebooks and built-in character improvements. Game Designer: Amit Moshe, Graphic Designers: Manuel Serra, Juancho Capic
